remarks: The rank of the union of two sets.  Theorem 15.17(iii) of [Monk1] p. 112.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jun-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
statement: rankunb $p |- ( ( A e. U. ( R1 " On ) /\ B e. U. ( R1 " On ) ) -> ( rank ` ( A u. B ) ) = ( ( rank ` A ) u. ( rank ` B ) ) ) $.
